name: consanguineously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is connected with people who are closely related to each other by birth : The law forbids the marriage of cousins who are consanguineously related. All of the women agreed that they did not want their children to marry consanguineously.
More examplesFewer examplesThey carried out a study of young women who were consanguineously married.Most of the people in the study said they married consanguineously as a result of their parents' choice.The study found little difference in terms of health between consanguineously married women and those who marry outside of the family.
